short_summary: construction and repair of a ship
description: The contractor will carry out the inspection, repair, and maintenance and alterations of the Canadian Coast Guard Vessel CCGS Griffon in accordance with Annex A – Statement of Work , and any associated technical information.
full_summary:
=================================
**Notice Title**: F2599-240001 - CCGS Griffon Alongside Refit 2024 Tender Notice

**Date Published**: April 29, 2024

**Date Tender Closes**: June 4, 2024 at 14:00 EST

**Solicitation Number**: WS4561220554

**Procurement Category**: Professional Services

The Canadian Department of Public Works and Government Services intends to award a contract for the maintenance, repair, and alteration of the Canadian Coast Guard Vessel CCGS Griffon. The contract is expected to begin on an undetermined date and is scheduled to conclude on November 8, 2024.

**Requirements**

The contractor will be responsible for carrying out inspections, repairs, and maintenance, as well as alterations, to the vessel in accordance with the Statement of Work outlined in Annex A. The scope of work includes the management and supervision of the project, as well as all necessary labor, materials, and equipment.

**Trade Agreements**

This tender notice pertains to contracts governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Contact Information**

For more information on this tender opportunity, contact:

Mark Hatherall (SPAC/PSPC)
mark.hatherall@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
[Canada](tel:)

**Note**

The tender closing time has been amended to June 4, 2024, at 14:00 EST. All required supporting documentation and responses must be submitted by this time. Late submissions will be considered non-responsive.

**Access to Tender Documents**

Access the tender notice and associated documents on the Ariba Discovery website: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19549888?extsite=MTk1NDk4ODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

This tender opportunity is governed by the Government of Canada's procurement regulations. Interested suppliers must ensure they adhere to all requirements and timelines outlined in this notice and the associated documents. For further information, contact the above-mentioned contact.%%CE%after midnight PDT.
